Responsibilities: Design, build, and maintain robust, scalable web applications using Python (Flask, Django, FastAPI) on the backend and modern frontend frameworks like React, Angular, or Vue.js.
Collaborate with AI teams to integrate or explore LLMs and generative AI capabilities into products.
Contribute to architectural decisions ensuring systems are secure, maintainable, and cloud-native.
Deploy, monitor, and optimize applications using AWS, GCP, or Azure, with a focus on performance and reliability.
Mentor junior developers and support peer growth.
Participate in code reviews, maintain high-quality code standards, and contribute to continuous improvement.
Qualifications: Bachelor's or Master's in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field
